meanings.definition: To eject a liquid in a sudden stream.
meanings.sent1: The water gun was squirting water all over the yard.
meanings.sent2: The lemon squirted juice when I squeezed it.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy kept squirting water from its mouth like a fountain.
meanings.sent4: The broken pipe was squirting water into the air like a geyser.
meanings.sent5: The ketchup bottle suddenly started squirting red sauce everywhere.

meanings.definition: A sudden, forceful expulsion of liquid.
meanings.sent1: The chef used a squirt of lemon juice to enhance the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent2: The water gun made a loud squirting sound as it sprayed water.
meanings.sent3: The prankster's squirting flower accessory made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: The burst balloon resulted in a squirting of confetti all over the room.
meanings.sent5: The squirting of champagne marked the beginning of the celebration.
